name: GGJ2021: Lost & Found - Stop the Count (Satire)
name_original: GGJ2021: Lost & Found - Stop the Count (Satire)
description:
Political satire on the US2020 Elections. This may touch on sensitive subjects for some people. Please consider if this is a game you want to play.

WASD: Movement

E: Open desk (Hold).

Avoid cops, discover the US2020 election truth.

Team:

Zeke

Eplox
